mapper.select: select R.*, C.* from REPLY R join CREW C on R.CREW_NUM = C.CREW_NUM order by BUNDLE_NUM ASC, BUNDLE_ORDER ASC
select count(*) from REPLY where BUNDLE_NUM = #{replyNum}
select BOARD_NUM , count(*) count from REPLY group by BOARD_NUM
mapper.update: update REPLY set BUNDLE_ORDER=BUNDLE_ORDER+1 where BUNDLE_NUM=#{bundleNum} and BUNDLE_ORDER>=#{bundleOrder}
update REPLY set REPLY_CONTENT='<del>삭제된 댓글입니다.</del>' , REPLY_CHANGE=0 where REPLY_NUM=#{replyNum}
update REPLY set REPLY_CONTENT=#{replyContent} , REPLY_CHANGE=1 , REPLY_CDATE=default where REPLY_NUM=#{replyNum}
